items.title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
items.creator: Ivan Mehta

items.translated_title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
items.content: As a technology, eSIM has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM’s upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel. Device compatibility One of the key factors for that is […]

items.translated_title: Energy storage industry set aggressive goals for 2025 — and already crushed them
items.content: The battery storage industry in the U.S. has grown in leaps and bounds in recent years, surpassing its most aggressive targets to become one of the largest new sources of power on the grid.

items.translated_title: In its first DSA penalty, EU fines X €120M for ‘deceptive’ blue check verification system
items.content: The EC is taking issue with the fact that X, the social network formerly known as Twitter, has been allowing anyone to buy a "blue checkmark," the platform's long-standing symbol that a user has been verified to be who they are claiming to be.
